name: FlamingoSounds
0:
”Alexa open Flamingo Sounds”
”Alexa ask Flamingo Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flamingo sounds
des:
Bring the vibrant and social world of flamingos into your home with the Flamingo Sounds skill. Hear the lively chatter, calls, and splashes of these beautiful birds as they mingle in their flocks, creating a lively and cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for brightening your day and satisfying avian enthusiasts.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Flamingo Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
